tool_description:
Ludo King Room Code Api with autostart , result
Ludo King Room Code Api with autostart , manual result
New Ludoking Roomcode check Api, ( classic, popular , quick)

Auto-starting Ludo King room code API: In this scenario, an automated bot will initiate a game, and once two players join, it will commence the match and then exit, allowing the two players to continue. All matches using this API will automatically begin once two players have joined using the room code.

If payment issue go to the...
name: Ludo King Room Code Api
title: Ludo King Room Code Api

api_list.name: Quick Costom  Bot
Get Classic Roomcode
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ludo-king-room-code-api2.p.rapidapi.com/rapidapi/results/classic/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ludo-king-room-code-api2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
